## Source: ossf-package-analysis (37303cd2612eb43ffb58ddd122ce54430d2fd95ac85b3ec84c7af5b571eeffff)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'nuerst' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
